column4: Hello. I' trying to install ubuntu 8.10, when i m select install from boot menu, it looks what all ok (http://s59.radikal.ru/i163/0811/10/ff147d1ccfcd.jpg), but after some minutes it's write so: http://s49.radikal.ru/i126/0811/47/f94413753490.jpg what i must to do?
You downloaded the Server Edition, right?
Yeh sorry, you didn't just saw that your X server crashes ^^
hm... why it can be? Ubuntu 8.04 installing good
Are you familiar with the console? If so, please change to the directory /var/log and let us know what the file Xorg.0.log looks like.
my ubuntu is not installed yet...
You should still be able to open the log with "nano /var/log/Xorg.0.log"
The LiveCD outputs those logs, too. Not only the installed version. ^^
i will try. Thanks *rebooting
Ah, you're typing on the machine you want to install to?
Alright, good luck then. :D
yes, Thanks
are you here?

it s photos of lof =)

Alright, found something that might help you: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=6073006
Your problem is probably the missing Radeon drivers. Try using the alternate Install CD to get it installed and then install the drivers afterwards.
